imdb.plot outline: Alex aka 2GUNS is a beautiful and dangerous Hispanic female who has been making her way on the streets from a young age. She has been scarred from a rough painful childhood having to street fight to survive. Reunited now with her two close childhood friends, Jay and Vargo. together they take on jobs law enforcement can't and some people will pay dearly for. This unlikely team sets out on a thrilling journey of friendship. loyalty and adventure.
imdb.title: Alex 2GUNS
